socketedItems.secDescrText: Targets an allied player to apply a buff which links you to them for a duration. While linked, your Energy Shield will intercept some of the damage they would take. 20% increased Skill Effect Duration

You die if Linked target dies

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.

You and nearby Allies have 24% increased Armour and Evasion Rating

+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
